title: Additional Options & Redux

redux.tooltip: Includes among other changes the inclusion of the D-Pad for dedicated item buttons

tooltip: The regular Majora's Mask experience{0}With support for languages, redux and additional options

title: The Legend of Zelda Revival
tooltip: A small-sized ROM hack in a completely new setting

title: The Legend of Zelda: Master Quest

redux.tooltip: Includes among other changes the inclusion of the D-Pad for dedicated item buttons

tooltip: A Master Quest style romhack for Majora's Mask, offering a higher difficulty with remixed dungeons and some overworld changes{0}The path of progress has been changed to be in a different order

title: The Legend of Zelda: Masked Quest
tooltip: A Master Quest style romhack for Majora's Mask, offering a higher difficulty{0}The patch contains major changes to where progress is obtained throughout the overworld and dungeons{0}Includes some of the changes featured in the Redux / Randomizer patches like D-Pad support

title: KZ Practice ROM
command: Force Remap D-Pad No Expand Memory Force Downgrade Patch Boot DOL
tooltip: A trainer / practice / testing utility for The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask{0}Formally known by its codename 'kz', but generally referred to as 'The Practice ROM'

title: KZ Practice ROM (Lite)
command: Force Remap D-Pad No Expand Memory Force Downgrade Patch Boot DOL
tooltip: A trainer / practice / testing utility for The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask{0}Formally known by its codename 'kz', but generally referred to as 'The Practice ROM'{0}The lite version has a very limited amount of memory and is more prone to crashing
